analysis.key_quote: To reclassify these employees as proposed by this rule will make those employees in critical positions subject to the whim of each new President and will make our federal agencies more political, not less political.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing concerns about politicization of civil service and the importance of a merit-based system, which aligns with the themes of non-partisanship and institutional knowledge.
